nodes.text: The Strehkforce Camp was a military camp located in the Gallo Mountains, on the planet Naboo, during the Galactic Civil War. It was inhabited by the Strehkforce, a mercenary unit. Circa 1 ABY, Strehkforce mercenaries went to Dee'ja Peak and stole a Stonewall Labs security beacon from Vance Groten. Spacers who were working with Groten later went to the mercenary camp to recover it. The spacers attacked the Strehkforce mercenaries and killed their leaders Evan Strehk and Maris Fahrs.

The Strehkforce Camp was a location in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Strehkforce Camp was added to the game as part of the "Legacy Quest" with the release of the "Publish 25", a.k.a. the "New Game Enhancements", on November 15, 2005.
